Sentencas: This paper presents a model predictive controller (MPC) operating a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) gas turbine hybrid plant at end-of-life performance condition.
Titulo: Advanced Control System for Grid-Connected SOFC Hybrid Plants: Experimental Verification in Cyber-Physical Mode

Sentencas: Its performance was assessed with experimental tests showing a comparison with a proportional integral derivative (PID) control system.
Titulo: Advanced Control System for Grid-Connected SOFC Hybrid Plants: Experimental Verification in Cyber-Physical Mode

Sentencas: The hybrid system (HS) operates in grid-connected mode, i.e., at variable speed condition of the turbine.
Titulo: Advanced Control System for Grid-Connected SOFC Hybrid Plants: Experimental Verification in Cyber-Physical Mode

Sentencas: The control system faces a multivariable constrained problem, as it must operate the plant into safety conditions while pursuing its objectives.
Titulo: Advanced Control System for Grid-Connected SOFC Hybrid Plants: Experimental Verification in Cyber-Physical Mode

Sentencas: The goal is to test whether a linearized controller design for normal operating condition is able to govern a system which is affected by strong performance degradation.
Titulo: Advanced Control System for Grid-Connected SOFC Hybrid Plants: Experimental Verification in Cyber-Physical Mode

Sentencas: The control performance was demonstrated in a cyber-physical emulator test rig designed for experimental analyses on such HSs.
Titulo: Advanced Control System for Grid-Connected SOFC Hybrid Plants: Experimental Verification in Cyber-Physical Mode

Sentencas: This laboratory facility is based on the coupling of a 100 kW recuperated microturbine with a fuel cell emulation system based on vessels for both anodic and cathodic sides.
Titulo: Advanced Control System for Grid-Connected SOFC Hybrid Plants: Experimental Verification in Cyber-Physical Mode

Sentencas: The components not physically present in the rig were studied with a real-time model running in parallel with the plant.
Titulo: Advanced Control System for Grid-Connected SOFC Hybrid Plants: Experimental Verification in Cyber-Physical Mode

Sentencas: Model output values were used as set-point data for obtaining in the rig (in real-time mode) the effect of the fuel cell system.
Titulo: Advanced Control System for Grid-Connected SOFC Hybrid Plants: Experimental Verification in Cyber-Physical Mode

Sentencas: The result comparison of the MPC tool against a PID control system was carried out considering several plant properties and the related constraints.
Titulo: Advanced Control System for Grid-Connected SOFC Hybrid Plants: Experimental Verification in Cyber-Physical Mode

Sentencas: Both systems succeeded in managing the plant, still the MPC performed better in terms of smoothing temperature gradient and peaks.
Titulo: Advanced Control System for Grid-Connected SOFC Hybrid Plants: Experimental Verification in Cyber-Physical Mode
